label: A2B_tP12_111_2n_bce-001
title: MnF$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
This is the high pressure phase of MnF$_{2}$, with data taken at 200$^\circ$C and 35 kbar.  At standard temperature and pressure MnF$_{2}$ is in the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tP6_136_f_a-001}{rutile ($C4$) structure}. 
 (Yagi, 1979) consistently refers to space group $P\overline{4}2m$ as ``\#113,'' but it is actually \#111, and the Wyckoff positions are consistent with $P\overline{4}2m$ \#111.
